get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to your personal manga notification assistant.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to add or remove a manga from your list.
get_started.help: Start by adding your first manga.

manga.website: Enter in the website of the manga. Link to the manga's list of chapters page.
manga.added: Cool. It's now been added to your list.

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting our store, be sure to check out all the great styles we have on the summer section.
